To use ANT+, you must have the ANT+ Plugin Service installed.
OK, install ANT+ Plugin Service now

Choose location source (GPS, google fused, network)
Merged location obtained from GPS and network; might jump between those two sources.
Location obtained with the help of available base stations and WLANs; requires access to the internet.

Factor 0 < α ≤ 1 to smooth the power value.\nP_display = α P_measured + (1-α) P_display_old\nThe smaller α, the smoother the displayed value. I.e., α=1 gives the measured power, α close to 0 results in a super smooth displayed power.
The smoothing factor α must be between 0 and 1.

Ready to send an email with the training files.
Do you want to upload your workouts to Dropbox?\n(Due to the changed API, we have to ask again.)
Show the average value of the entire workout.
Show the maximal value of the workout.
Show the average of the last %1$d %2$s.
Show the average value of the last %1$d received values.

Exponential smoothing with 0 < α ≤ 1. Displayed_value = α measured_value + (1-α) display_value_old. The smaller α, the smoother the displayed value. I.e., α=1 gives the current measurement, α close to 0 results in super smooth displayed values.
